summary: This is an email from Jeffrey Epstein referencing a New York Post article about him pleading not guilty to sex trafficking charges, with a link to the article and a comment about the artwork depicting him.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email and the linked news article; he is reported to have pleaded not guilty to sex trafficking charges.

events.title: Epstein pleads not guilty to sex trafficking charges
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein enters a plea of not guilty to federal sex trafficking charges.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein pleaded not guilty to sex trafficking charges on July 8, 2019.
The email contains a link to a New York Post article reporting on the plea.
The sender (likely Epstein) comments 'Pretty good artwork of me' in reference to the article.
